The Mahabharata #

By Vyasa

Overview #

Summary #

“The Mahabharata” is a truly epic work. It’s said to be the longest poem ever written and is packed with stories about duty, morality, and human relationships. It follows the tale of the Kuru dynasty, with a focus on the Pandavas and Kauravas and their eventual battle, the Kurukshetra war. Along the way, youâ€™ll find tons of lessons about life and philosophy, including the Bhagavad Gita, which is like a guidebook for how to live your life.
